localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: I never followed him. Anyone else?
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text: 我从来没有跟踪过他。还有其他人吗？
我從來沒有跟蹤過他。還有其他人嗎？

previous.title: On the topic of insider trading, here's stock trading by US Senators alongside $SPY. The big negative bar is when a couple got caught doing some fishy trades this year and had to sell off their stocks.

localize.title: 关于内幕交易的话题，下面是美国参议员与斯普林特PY的股票交易情况。大阴柱是今年一对夫妇做一些蹊跷的交易被抓，不得不抛售股票。
關於內幕交易的話題，下面是美國參議員與斯普林特PY的股票交易情況。大陰柱是今年一對夫婦做一些蹊蹺的交易被抓，不得不拋售股票。

next.excerpt:
I've been mainly lurking for a few years and in my opinion, there are currently
a few issues regarding this subreddit:



 * too much publicity

WSB was originally a small community of autists wanting to make big gains with
smart plays. Today WSB is more like an open discussion board, that's all…
next.title: Future of WSB

localize.title: WSB的未来
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我主要潜伏了几年，在我看来，目前有
关于这个subreddit的几个问题。



 * 太多的宣传

WSB原本是一个自闭症患者的小团体，希望通过大的收获
聪明的游戏。今天的WSB更像是一个开放的讨论区，就这样... ...

localize.title: WSB的未來
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我主要潛伏了幾年，在我看來，目前有
關於這個subreddit的幾個問題。



 * 太多的宣傳

WSB原本是一個自閉症患者的小團體，希望通過大的收穫
聰明的遊戲。今天的WSB更像是一個開放的討論區，就這樣... ...
